data.text:
@NessieAndrew @Sports_Tipster7 @UKCovid19Stats Scotland is a mess and where is my laptop and bike I was promised from the snp.
They are the reason I moved to England and I love it here,glad the snp have ran Scotland into the ground as I could never live in such a hateful racist country as what the snp have produced
@UKCovid19Stats How can we get the Uk and England  new cases and deaths as no longer on TV please advise thank U
@UKCovid19Stats Gotta get the vaccines up now it's been embarrassing how few have getting done since the start of this year

@jimmy_johnno @Sports_Tipster7 @UKCovid19Stats So fewer restrictions? And you think that would have worked out better? OK.

You do realise, objectively, over the pandemic Scotland have done significantly better than rUK. Just compare the overall death rates.
